message:
It just got better! We're introducing Mi 5s and Mi 5s Plus today, with features that take our 2016 flagship Mi 5 to a whole new level. Latest Qualcomm¬Æ Snapdragon‚Ñ¢ 821 processor? Check. Ultrasonic under-glass fingerprint sensing technology? Check. All-new, larger, Sony IMX378 1/2.3" CMOS camera sensor that's found only in digital compact cameras? Check. We're elevating the tech in the specs with the Mi 5s.

For those who prefer larger screens, we're also introducing Mi 5s Plus ‚Äî which comes with a larger 5.7-inch display and a dual-camera system for incredible image quality. With two 13-megapixel sensors, one captures in colour while the other only in black and white; they work together to improve image quality, resulting in photos with finer details and less noise. The Mi 5s Plus is also powered by the Qualcomm¬Æ Snapdragon‚Ñ¢ 821 processor and has a maximum clock speed of 2.35GHz, as well as up to 6GB LPDDR4 RAM and 128GB of UFS 2.0 internal storage. Antutu score of 164,119? Yes, please!

Mi 5s
- Ultra light-sensitive camera
- Sony IMX378 1/2.3" CMOS sensor
- Buttonless, ultrasonic fingerprint detection
- Qualcomm¬Æ Snapdragon‚Ñ¢ 821 flagship processor
- LPDDR4 RAM + UFS 2.0 Flash
- Full metal body
- 5.15‚Äù ultra bright, energy-saving display display
- Maximum 600-nit brightness, uses 16 LED lights
- 95% NTSC color gamut
- Full-feature NFC
- 4G+ Internet
- Quick Charge 3.0

Mi 5s Plus
- 5.7" energy-saving display with comfortable grip
- Sony 13MP+13MP dual camera
- Qualcomm¬Æ Snapdragon‚Ñ¢ 821 processor
- 6GB RAM + 128GB Flash
- Full feature NFC

Today we unveil Mi TV 3s‚Äîthe first Mi TV with a built-in artificial intelligence system that is able to learn your content preferences to give you personalised recommendations. Mi TV 3S 65-inch also comes with a wireless surround sound home theatre system so you get an immersive viewing experience.

Mi TV 3S 65-inch:
Samsung 4K panel with HDR support
Vivid details and bright picture quality
9.9mm thin
Aluminium alloy frame with brushed aluminium back
Quad-core 64-bit processor
Built-in A.I. for smarter recommendations
Independent sound system
Dolby and DTS hardware-level decoding

Mi TV 3S 55 Inch:
LG IPS 4K panel
True-to-life colour details and picture quality
Supports HDR
9.9mm thin
Aluminium alloy frame with brushed aluminium back
Quad-core 64-bit processor
Built-in A.I. for smarter recommendations
Dolby and DTS hardware-level decoding

It's incredibly thin. Similar in thinness to most phones you're using, and it's perfect for that additional juice you need throughout the day. Make the 10000 mAh Mi Power Bank Pro your portable charging companion today. http://bit.ly/2cp7f0K

Rahil Bhagat calls #Mi5 "The Android phone that's the best value for your money" on Forbes Asia. 

"Its specs are top notch, the fingerprint sensor is among the best I have ever used and this is probably the first phone from Xiaomi that I would deem as truly sexy.

I know that personally, with the Xiaomi Mi 5, I have found my new daily driver."

Do you think Mi 5 is truly sexy? :) Share this post if you do!

Read the full review here: 
http://www.forbes.com/sites/rahilbhagat/2016/08/31/the-xiaomi-mi-5-might-just-be-the-most-value-for-money-android-phone-you-can-buy/2/#2a74935624b7

According to IDC, Xiaomi is now the 3rd largest smartphone vendor across India's top 30 cities with an 8.1% market share (Q2 2016), up three spots from Q1. We couldn't have achieved this without our passionate India Mi fans üôåüöÄ Thanks for the love! üòç

Leave the wallet at home! Introducing #MiPay, our contactless mobile payment service, launching first in China in partnership with one of the world's largest payment networks - UnionPay. 

About Mi Pay
- Mi Pay works with NFC-enabled smartphones such as Mi 5
- Supports debit and credit cards from 20 banks
- Users bind their cards into the Mi Wallet app
- Touch to pay at over 4M retail points of sale in China
- KICKER: Mi Pay also supports transportation cards in major cities

This makes Mi the first smartphone company to support both NFC bank card payments and public transportation cards!

Map your path to cleanliness with #MiRobotVacuum, which uses our in-house LDS technology and 12 different sensors to create cleaning maps for each individual home. Tough on dirt, hair, carpets and more with max 1800Pa air pressure. How many of you are missing this at home?

MI ROBOT VACUUM
- Calculates best cleaning path with 12 sensors including LDS, ultrasonic radar sensor, cliff sensor, gyroscope and accelerometer
- In-house developed Laser Distance Sensor (LDS), 360¬∞ scanning, 1800 times/second; similar to laser guiding systems on self-driving cars
- Powerful yet ultra-quiet Nidec brushless DC motor (up to 1800Pa air pressure)
- Main brush auto-adjusts height to create tight seal with floor for thorough dirt pick-up on uneven surfaces
- 3 dedicated processors for real-time mapping and positioning
- Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM) algorithm to calculate optimised cleaning paths
- 5200mAh battery for up to 2.5h cleaning
- Smart phone controls, real-time monitoring, and set cleaning schedules via Mi Home app
- Priced at RMB 1699

#Xiaomi is the most popular and relevant brand among China's millennial consumers, according to a report by RTG Consulting Group. üôåüèº

‚ÄúWe believe that these brands have made themselves so indispensable, that consumers often can‚Äôt imagine living without them,"said Angelito Tan Jr., the CEO of RTG Consulting Group. 

Yup! We can't imagine life without Mi either. What about you? Which Mi products are indispensable to you? :)

#MIUI8 is ready to Simplify your life! MIUI 8's global stable version will begin rolling out tomorrow so make sure to set aside some special updating time when you get that notification! üòä

Which feature are you dying to try out first? Scrolling screenshots, Quick Ball, Dual apps (for Pok√©mon Go? üòâ) or Second Space?

Happy 6th birthday, #MIUI!! Over 200 million users around the world are celebrating this happy occasion with us. üòç  Thank you, Mi fans, for your constant support and growing along with MIUI‚Äîwe're only going to get even better with age. üôèüèº   üéâ  üéÇ

Let's go down memory lane‚Äîhow long have you been using MIUI and what was the first feature you discovered that made you fall in love with it?

Virtually anything is possible! That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre introducing #MiVR Play, a lightweight VR headset that sends you into an alternate reality with immersive 2D, 3D and panoramic videos. China users interested in beta testing can do so for RMB 1. Are you ready to PLAY?

Mi VR Play
- Wrapped in lightweight Lycra for long-lasting comfort
- Secure fit with two-way zip and anti-slip rubber strips
- Anti-reflective, optical-grade aspheric lens provide maximum clarity
- Fits 4.7‚Äù - 5.7‚Äù display smartphones
- Download Mi VR app, an open VR platform for China, which has panoramic, 2D and 3D content library, updated weekly.
- Comes in stylish prints and colors for a bold look

With over 110M Redmi sold globally, we‚Äôre now taking one step further with our first flagship #RedmiPro. Features dual cameras and an OLED display. That‚Äôs not all, we also unveil the long-awaited #MiNotebookAir! Thin, lightweight, full metal, yet surprising powerful. Powered by Intel Core i5, NVIDIA GeForce 940MX dedicated graphics card, and has expandable SSD slot. Available in 13.3‚Äù (RMB 4999) and 12.5‚Äù (RMB 3499). Which of these do you like best?

Redmi Pro
- 13MP + 5MP dual rear cameras, dynamic DSLR-quality bokeh
- Helio X25 10-core processor, tri-cluster architecture
- 5.5‚Äù OLED display, 100% NTSC, 60000:1 contrast ratio
- 4050mAh battery, front fingerprint sensor, USB Type-C
- 4GB RAM + 128GB Flash (expandable)
- Brushed aluminum body, 2.5D curved glass
- Hybrid SIM slot, VoLTE support

Mi Notebook Air 13.3"
- Intel Core i5 processor, runs Windows 10 Home
- 8GB DDR4 RAM + 256GB PCIe SSD, expandable SSD slot
- NVIDIA GeForce 940MX dedicated graphics card
- 9.5-hour battery, 50% charge in 30min
- Lightweight full metal body, weighs just 1.28kg
- Elegant logoless design, personalize with stickers
- Supports Mi Cloud Sync and Mi Band unlocking

Mi Notebook Air 12.5"
- Sized like a magazine, just 12.9mm thin
- Full metal body, only weighs 1.07kg
- Intel Core M3 processor, 11.5-hour battery
- 4GB RAM + 128GB SATA SSD, expandable SSD slot
- 1080p FHD screen, edge-to-edge protective glass
- AKG custom dual speakers, Dolby digital surround sound

#MiMax is the new big and everyone's eager to make the switch! We swapped football fan Conroy's phone with Mi Max for him to try...will he stick with his old phone or switch to the new big? Watch and find out :)

Watch Hugo Barra's epic showdown with #MiMax LIVE tonight at 6PM IST (8:30 PM GMT+8) on mi.com/in or Mi India's Facebook page and get to know the new big shot in town, Mi Max ‚ò∫ Share this with friends who like it BIG!

#MIUI8 is coming soon to Simplify your life with a slew of all-new, indispensable innovations, under-the-hood tweaks, and a gorgeous, colorful interactive UI. Public beta starts on July 11 and stable rollout on August 16. Which features are you most excited to start using? :) 

- Dual apps: use 2 different accounts for any app you want
- Second space: two entirely separate profiles on your phone
- Gallery: your all-in-one creative hub for photos and videos: native video editing, redesigned thumbnails, Mi Cloud Photo Sync, and Quick sharing
- Scrolling screenshots: capture more in a single screenshot with precise cropping
- Quick ball: fully customizable 5-gesture shortcut accessible even from lock screen
- Calculator: smart conversions baked into the app
